Emily Darchuk, a food scientist who lives in Portland, Ore., was dismayed by how much excess whey was discarded (billions of pounds a year) despite its nutritional value; it’s used to make protein powder, ricotta and some brands of yogurt. She started researching and experimenting to develop a clear spirit, 80 proof, distilled from whey.
